website_summaries.verdict: A high-end motorcycle jacket that will maintain its appearance for an extended period of time.
pros: Cowhide leather construction ensures the jacket will continue to dazzle both now and in the future
Multiple pockets offer lots of storage space
Belted waist guarantees a comfortable fit
Quilted polyester lining will help you stay warm when you ride

customer_reviews.title: Pick your size wisely!  Also, great for Negan cosplay!
customer_reviews.text: We did measurements, looked at the chart provided, read reviews, read questions...and with everything taken into account...it said my brother should fit into an XL, but we originally ordered him a 2XL. It was WAY too small. In regular jackets, he's in between an XL and 2XL. We ended up trying the 4XL and we were glad we did! It was perfect for what we needed. It fit correctly, we just wished that we didn't have to play size games in order to find this out! My brother wore this for Negan cosplay and it was just perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Villegas

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: love this jacket when riding in winter. I wore this Jacket for a ride on my motorcycle Christmas day, 33 degrees out and I was warm on the highway. Do buy at least one size larger I wear a XL and purchased the XXL and it fits great. If you conceal carry, I suggest 2 sizes larger as I cannot carry under the arms with the one I bought without it showing. if you carry in your waist band, your probably alright as there is adjustment there that would allow for that.
customer_reviews.author: MrParadigm

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket
customer_reviews.text: This is the fourth Element jacket I have bought for my husband over the [ast many years. He wears his jacket every day riding to work and for weekend rides. The leather quality and workmanship are great. The prices are always reasonable. He still has the older ones but no longer fits into them. He has passed one or two down to our grandson who also rides. Just a note on sizing: they run a little small so we always go up a size from the measurements, this allows layering for winter riding and warmth. Ride to live, live to ride. PS: I also have the Ladies Element jacket for myself..
customer_reviews.author: Sue P.

customer_reviews.title: Order a far bigger size than what you need
customer_reviews.text: The sizing is off. Because of previous reviews, I ordered it three sizes bigger than what I normally need. The sleeves are long, like they are the size I ordered. However, the body part of it is sized as though I ordered the size I need, rather than three sizes bigger. These things, other than the sleeves, are sized WAY small! Other than that, I love this jacket!
customer_reviews.author: Lucretia Rossi

customer_reviews.title: These run 2 sizes too small!
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear an XL tshirt, but ordered a large jacket. When I received it, it fit like a medium at best. I returned it and went with a XXL and it's a better fit. I may have to return because when I put on warmer clothing, it's once again too tight. I'm 6'1" and 225 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Coree Mooneyham

customer_reviews.title: Okay quality, order 3 sizes larger than your actual jacket size
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is pretty absurd, i wear a 2x and a 5 fit well enough. Decent quality, but arrived with several holes punctured in the sleeves... yet the bag was undamaged. I bought this as part of a 50s get up for a sock hop with my daughter. This won't hold up to daily use. A great example of "you get what you pay for".
customer_reviews.author: shane southwood

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking and Very Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent jacket! I was looking to purchase a leather jacket for casual wear. This jacket exceeded my expectations. It fits well and looks very good. It's a little on the heavy side, but I don't mind. I would recommend this jacket for anyone looking for an inexpensive good looking jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Cisco

customer_reviews.title: IM DEFINATELY BUYING THIS AGAIN WHEN I GET MY NEXT MOTORCYCLE
customer_reviews.text: I BOUGHT THIS JACKET, AND IT FIT GREAT, I SOLD MY MOTORCYCLE TO MOVE OUT OF STATE, AND THEN I PASSED THIS JACKET ONTO MY DAD, IT EVEN FIT HIM GREAT, TOO! EXCELENT CRAFTSMANSHIP, I DEFINITELY TURNED HEADS IN THIS JACKET.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: order big,needs to air out before bringing it inside
customer_reviews.text: The jacket was finished with something strong odor, and sizing was really small I wear 2xl big & tall exelement jacket was a 6xl fits perfectly,its really a warm jacket seems to be very good quality made,beware the older is really strong had to hang it outside for a couple days but I'm glad I bought it
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Clark

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket
customer_reviews.text: This is a great jacket. It fits perfectly and is just the right weight. I highly recommend this seller and product. This is my favorite jacket that I've ever owned.
customer_reviews.author: Lou Rusconi

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't get it
customer_reviews.text: A little over a year ago i bought this and it was a killer jacket, still is, but i bought another about a month ago and it was not good.. It was made from something very cheap, if it was leather it had to be a rodent of some kind and it reeked of some industrial chemical, it gave me and everyone around me huge headaches.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell

customer_reviews.title: The jackets great. The leather is a bit thinner than I'd ...
customer_reviews.text: The jackets great. The leather is a bit thinner than I'd hoped but it fits well enough and looks good. I'm a good size bodybuilder so I ordered a 2x. I like a fitted look. Across the chest and shoulders the jacket looks like it was custom tailored for me. The bottom of the jacket is huge. The sleeves are snug on my biceps (19") and forearms. Overall I'm satisfied. I do think it's deplorable that Leather Up will not ship to American service men serving overseas. Because I'm on the other end of an APO I had to ship the jacket to family so they could ship it to me.
customer_reviews.author: W.Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket. Great Price..
customer_reviews.text: Now that I have had this for a year, I am ready to comment. I really like it. Good fit, looks and feels great. Broke in real nice. Looks better with age.. My advice> Buy It.
customer_reviews.author: GreyLion

customer_reviews.title: Runs about one size smaller than advertised
customer_reviews.text: I had my wife measure me and we followed the chart exactly to order. The jacket I received was a Large as I specified but I had to return it due to being too tight on me. Move up one size and you will be happy. I will be reordering. It is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: RF

customer_reviews.title: I normally wear a small but order to medium just in case and I'm glad I did
customer_reviews.text: The size could be a little larger for a Medium the sleeve length would probably be too long. Everything else is exactly as described
customer_reviews.author: RobbinOfCanyonLake

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was a great replacement for my last jacket. Great jacket, good price. Highly recommend. (Derek Cheatham)
customer_reviews.author: Cheatham

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Looking, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very Nice Looking, great quality, I was surprised at the quality. it is great.
customer_reviews.author: Ruben G.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent leather quality
customer_reviews.text: Excellent leather quality, but too heavy. I conditioned them with Huberd's Shoe Grease to make them water resistant. I wore it the entire winter 2014 in Boston with a thermal underneath and a scarf. It did a good job.
customer_reviews.author: JFP

customer_reviews.title: It is Loved
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son for Christmas, with all its bells and whistles, he likes it!
customer_reviews.author: xanadune

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is very high quality, and is what I'd expect in a $300 leather not an $80 one!!! Everything about it is as expected fron reading the reviews. I ordered a medium instead of a small because most people said to order larger and while it's a little large on me now I'm sure I'll grow into it. People love this jacket and think it is way more expensive than it is.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE PRICES AND SELECTIONS .
customer_reviews.text: HAD TO GET IT THE FIRST TIME I SAW IT I KNEW IT WAS MADE FOR ME LOVE THE STYLE AND THE WAY IT FITS
customer_reviews.author: MIGUEL FIGUEROA

customer_reviews.title: Check you size. Sizes run small.
customer_reviews.text: The jacket exceeds my expectations. No rips, tears or holes in the lining, pockets, etc. All zippers are spot on, solid. The leather is thick as I like it to be. Overall, FANTASTIC. Only critique is that the measurements are in European sizes. I normally wear a 2xl. Almost couldnt take it off. Had to go with 5xl on this jacket which fits well but sleeves are a tad long but workable.
customer_reviews.author: Jose A Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: I need your clothes, your boots, and your motorcycle.
customer_reviews.text: Love this jacket! Just like a previous review, I've wanted a jacket just like this since I saw T2 as a kid. I've gotten so many compliments on it already and everytime i llook in the mirror i think about how badass i look. good price too! if you went to a bike store you'd probably pay 50-100$ more! love it
customer_reviews.author: Ol' Sweetpea

customer_reviews.title: Nice soft Leather biker Jacket
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband as a birthday present. I liked the shiny soft leather. It wasn't stiff like a lot of your leather jackets are. The price was great. I would recommend this to a friend
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: The leather quality is great, very thick
customer_reviews.text: Shipped very fast. Smell of leather is overwhelming at first but then as time goes by it fades. The leather quality is great, very thick!! i'm surprised at the great quality of this jacket for the price point. zippers are strong, the belt & buckle are great. the only thing im concerned about is the pocket lining, i seems somewhat thin. i will have to be careful what i put in them. i wear a medium and ordered a large jacket & the fit is just right. Would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Ian Brown

customer_reviews.title: Quality leather very good, very heavy
customer_reviews.text: Arrived on time. Quality leather very good, very heavy. Left shoulder epallet button was not attached in place. I had it repaired.
customer_reviews.author: Geraldine Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket for a great Price
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my nephew, I bought a 2 x because what I read said it was sized small. The size was just about perfect and the leather and quality is great,my Nephew really like the Jacket. I am very happy with the quality and leather and the price which I paid for the jacket .
customer_reviews.author: mckennycoy

customer_reviews.title: It looks nice, isn't too warm for summer
customer_reviews.text: Months into riding with this jacket I can definitely say that it is a quality product. It looks nice, isn't too warm for summer, and keeps the chill of your bones during winter. I would buy it again if I had to, but with the way it has impressed me, I don't think I'll ever get a chance to. It'll out last me.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Hole in pocket liner
customer_reviews.text: Received the jacket with a hole in the lining of one of the pockets. The lining material is really thin so I'm sure it's the first of many holes. For the price, I wasn't expecting anything super nice but having holes in it before I've even worn it is pretty bad.
customer_reviews.author: john friedman

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: XL was more like a Large. At the time of purchase, there was nothing in a bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: Queen V👸🏾

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Fit
customer_reviews.text: I received this very quickly. That new leather smell. It fits perfectly. Just remember to order one size larger. It worked for me. A lot of pockets. Just a great jacket and a great price too. If you're looking for a new jacket...this is the one.
customer_reviews.author: Millard Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This product is definitely worth the money. Bought the jacket for my brother, who wears a large. I ordered the XL, which was perfect. I only returned the jacket because he had already bought himself the same kind of jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi Posejpal

customer_reviews.title: Good quality good price.
customer_reviews.text: Other buyers indicated that one should buy one size larger then actual size which I did, which resulted in a good fit and room To wear a sweater underneath. Leather is sicker than I expected, which was good.
customer_reviews.author: Frederick Carothers

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket!
customer_reviews.text: Gave this jacket to my son-in-law for Christmas. He is about 6' and weighs about 175 lbs. and a large fits him fine. The leather is a good weight and he said the jacket was warm enough. He seemed to be very happy with this jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Lumley

customer_reviews.title: A very well made jacket toasty warm and I saves ...
customer_reviews.text: A very well made jacket toasty warm and I saves over $200 rather than buying it from a leather shop couldn't be happier
customer_reviews.author: John F Longan

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Jacket
customer_reviews.text: My son absolutely loves this jacket. It was bought as a costume piece for show choir and when my son got the jacket he said that he will continue to wear this jacket. It does run small so if you are a large size, I would say jump it up one size and you should be good...otherwise the jacket looks great!
customer_reviews.author: Vocalbeast

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit
customer_reviews.text: I normally wear a Large shirt and maybe a few XL coats- got the XXL and fits perfectly. I'm a skinny guy too and it is a fitted coat. It looks and feels great, just didn't have as much padding for a motorcycle coat as I was hoping.
customer_reviews.author: Wesley Karr

customer_reviews.title: Not for tall persons, other than that nice jacket
customer_reviews.text: Had to send back. Too short for my liking. I’m 6’5. Other than that Jacket was great. Easy return with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus DiMickele

customer_reviews.title: and shipped on time in perfect packaging! My son wore it in a production ...
customer_reviews.text: High quality craftsmanship, and shipped on time in perfect packaging! My son wore it in a production of "Leader of the Pack"! It looked great!
customer_reviews.author: greekgirl

customer_reviews.title: still a great fit great
customer_reviews.text: I had to compromise a little longer in the arms so that it would fit in the belly, still a great fit great price
customer_reviews.author: Paul W.

customer_reviews.title: My experience
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is very classic and durable. I am 18 years old. I am 5'7'' and 32W 30L. I went with a small for a more tighter fit look. I recommend this jacket. It's amazing for what you pay. It does smell at first when you open the package. But that's temporary.
customer_reviews.author: Victor m.

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a bigger size than I normally wear. I usually wear 2X or sometimes 3X in jackets. I ordered this jacket in 4X! it was super small. Very nice jacket though. Just way too small. I guess I should have ordered a 5X?!?
customer_reviews.author: DB24

customer_reviews.title: I had to return it because Everybody was saying “you ...
customer_reviews.text: I had to return it because Everybody was saying “you have to order one size bigger than your normal size” and I did and they were wrong so it was too big for me.
customer_reviews.author: Willirace

customer_reviews.title: classic
customer_reviews.text: Super classic biker jacket! Bought for the dentist in Little Shop of Horrors. Perfect!!!!
customer_reviews.author: akfcl

customer_reviews.title: Be Weary, Bigger Guys.
customer_reviews.text: My main problem with this is, as it is supposed to be a 4XL, it fits more snug and tightly, much like a shrunken 2XL t-shirt. The only thing remotely 4XL about this jacket is the longer sleeves. I can't even zip the damn thing up.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate sizes!!
customer_reviews.text: Item runs EXTREMELY SMALL ordered 2x and does not fit someone who wears Large.!! However, quality is very good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: very nice. Shipping as expected
customer_reviews.text: Was a gift. Gift fit as expected. I never saw first hand but as I understand it, very, very nice. Shipping as expected.
customer_reviews.author: David Magana

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great jacket for the money! The quality rivals other leather jackets costing far more. I am 5' 11" 200pds and ordered the XL. I have no issues as far as wearing a sweatshirt underneath the jacket if I need to. I paid $87.00 delivered and would be hard pressed to find as good a deal at a local motorcycle swap meet!
customer_reviews.author: Les Joseph

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was expecting. Good quality! I did orders one size up as recommended by other reviewers. I think that was a good idea. A large seems to be between a medium and large size, not 100% sure on this but it worked out perfect for my son.
customer_reviews.author: Todd

customer_reviews.title: Great Jacket
customer_reviews.text: Overall a really great jacket! Only issue was that the sizes run small, so go up a size when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Tignor

customer_reviews.title: Just as expected and brings back memories of the one someone liked enough to take as their own.
customer_reviews.text: Love the fit, well done. The CC pockets are deep and comfortable. Would have liked a removable liner.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is the best I ever had. I paid 290.00 for the one I had and this one is just like it for 100.00 less.
customer_reviews.author: Jacklyn Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: same size
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Jacket fit perfect. I ordered the size i wear and love the fit. I read the reviews where almost everyone said to get two sizes bigger. Didnt need too. I wear a xtra large thats what i ordered and i couldnt ask for a better fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must buy for a biker!
customer_reviews.text: Omg what a great jacket! Perfect motorcycle jacket! Real leather!
customer_reviews.author: Diane Kornblum

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best deal I ever got on Amazon!!!! Best quality for price item I've ever bought!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Frank D Robinson jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Always wanted one and have gotten so many comments and compliments on it. Fun to wear at my age. (65).
customer_reviews.author: Les Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very nice soft leather
customer_reviews.text: Bought for 2 teenage son - one to add patches and studs and one to keep clean! He loves both. Very nice soft leather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizes dont match
customer_reviews.text: I normally where a 1x... everyine was saying go 2 sizes bigger. I went 5x and i still couldnt zip it up.. had to send it back.
customer_reviews.author: Lane Rogers

customer_reviews.title: He absolutely loved it
customer_reviews.text: My boyfriend was shocked, it fit perfect, amazing quality .
customer_reviews.author: Charissa Dodge

customer_reviews.title: biker leather
customer_reviews.text: great looking & an excellent buy. Super high quality leather!!
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: It's a very good deal.
customer_reviews.text: Just a little bit heavy but excellent for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Danny R.

customer_reviews.title: XL perfect fit. XXL sleeves too long
customer_reviews.text: We got 2 jackets. XL perfect fit. XXL sleeves too long. We love them. Hope they protect us on the motorcycle.
customer_reviews.author: Jeniece Winstead

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it. Nice top grade leather. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Auman

customer_reviews.title: Expensive to look at.
customer_reviews.text: So the plus is it's a great looking jacket. If you have a large back and shoulders one size up will not fit. If you have a gut it's short and get a long. It shipped quickly and was returned at my cost of 27.00 dollars UPS. The refund took time from Leatherup about a week later after it arrived back to them. So I paid 27.00 to take a look at a leather jacket that did not fit. Not a good review for me 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Sandomar H

customer_reviews.title: 2 stars
customer_reviews.text: I'm being buying products from this company x years its a nice jacket to go out but no way for riding. If you go down with this jacket you'll suffer.
customer_reviews.author: ARMANDO RE

customer_reviews.title: Great quality jacket
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described, great quality. Fast shipping. Will definitely buy from this seller again.
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: heavy okay copy of a coat I owned for years
customer_reviews.author: tim s.

customer_reviews.title: ... hesitant considering the price but it arrived I'm beyond satisfied with it
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant considering the price but it arrived I'm beyond satisfied with it. Its warm,thick and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy M.

customer_reviews.title: Like the quality of the jacket but was to small ...
customer_reviews.text: Like the quality of the jacket but was to small for my son. He wears an XL but this XL was to small, sending back for bigger size.
customer_reviews.author: janice l jordan

customer_reviews.title: How I feel about this jacket was 😊
customer_reviews.text: I got it for my son, it fits him perfect. Completely better than I expected. We will be going through them again.
customer_reviews.author: Patina Lowery

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.text: What a great jacket for the price. Takes everyone's warning and buy a size larger.
customer_reviews.author: Dana H.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my son and he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Sylvia Keiser

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this jacket for $80 and was so happy when it got here. it is my first leather jacket and I was surprised by how heavy it is. Excellent for blocking the wind and it looks and feels so great. The only complaint I have is that the seam in the left pocket tore out, but I can fix it so im not worried about it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Gilbert

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the jacket was great, it does smell burn, and it have all the protection I need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fit was great they used a good leather overall a great jacket
customer_reviews.author: terry

customer_reviews.title: It seems like very good Quality leather & was very reasonable
customer_reviews.text: my son loves it !! It seems like very good Quality leather & was very reasonable!!! great purchase!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy marl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Make sure to order a size up, though
customer_reviews.text: This is a perfect leather jacket! I wanted one like this ever since I first saw Terminator 2. But make sure to order one size up. I did, and it fits perfectly. Way more than I expected for the price.
customer_reviews.author: nninja555

customer_reviews.title: He loved it! Great quality and nice leather for the ...
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son's 25th birthday. He loved it! Great quality and nice leather for the price!
customer_reviews.author: TE

customer_reviews.title: otherwise a fine jacket.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely short and a bit tight, otherwise a fine jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Jonny Muerte

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Very nice for the price. The size was perfect fit. Will defiantly order more leather from this site...leather up people!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Bricker

customer_reviews.title: don't even hesitate
customer_reviews.text: Quality is fine. Price is LOW. Warm on the motorcycle and style is rebel without a cause good. Best value going.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas B. Smith

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what we were looking for good quality product. Would recommend to friends and family. Very satisfied looking forward to enjoying.
customer_reviews.author: Danny Lucero

customer_reviews.title: Don"t like aluminum zippers.
customer_reviews.text: Could have used brass zippers instead of aluminum. Have to order larger than your size, tend to be a bit small on sizing.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Lyon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My grandson was so happy with it. fit like a glove.
customer_reviews.author: timmylaureen phillips

customer_reviews.title: would certainly recommend. good price for a great product
customer_reviews.text: solid jacket keeps, keeps me warm in the cooler temps. notice a little air intrusion at the 30 to 40 degree temps but nothing major. would certainly recommend. good price for a great product. would recommend going up a size if you prefer your jackets a little loose
customer_reviews.author: Boris B

customer_reviews.title: I love the Jacket & the price
customer_reviews.text: It is a wonderful Jacket I bought for my son & he Loves it & In fact I bought one more for my other son!
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Kaspereen

customer_reviews.title: I'm glad I read the other reviews of this jacket before ...
customer_reviews.text: I'm glad I read the other reviews of this jacket before I ordered it! They were right about the sizing, I ordered one size larger than I normally would and the jacket fits perfect! It is VERY Good quality (especially for the price), the leather is thick, heavy and soft and the jacket is very finely manufactured. Overall a very fine product!!
customer_reviews.author: J. J. Roy

customer_reviews.title: The xelement jacket is of good leather and a good fit i am 6 ft ...
customer_reviews.text: The xelement jacket is of good leather and a good fit i am 6 ft 178lbs an the large fit well other jackets something dont fit in the arms or the zippers dont zip. I have purchased gloves boots helmets good company
customer_reviews.author: james weaver

customer_reviews.title: Great Biker Jacket
customer_reviews.text: My husband was very happy with this jacket. He was looking for an orignal style biker jacket to wear on his motorcycle and this was it! I am happy with the quality of leather and workmanship and fit was true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Neen

customer_reviews.title: The jacket itself was beautiful. Quality of the leather was excellent
customer_reviews.text: The jacket itself was beautiful. Quality of the leather was excellent. I had to return it twice due to sizing. Not sure who is to blame for that.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nothen but good talk bout my biker leather i luv it
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Size was off...order 2 sizes bigger would be my suggestion
customer_reviews.author: David Batson

customer_reviews.title: Under-Sized and Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: It's under-sized and cheaply made. I normally wear a 2XL leather jacket, but to be safe I ordered one of these in 3XL. It's smaller and lighter (because it is cheaply made) than my 2XL jacket. It's even more disappointing that Amazon is making me pay for shipping to return this thing. Not only should it fit, but there should be room enough for a sweatshirt underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Rev. Moonshine

customer_reviews.title: Nice jacket, did have a very bad smell but ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice jacket,did have a very bad smell but after letting it air out outside and a few rides the smell was gone, I normally wear a size xlarge but ordered a3xlarge after reading the reviews and glad I did the jacket does run 2sizes small
customer_reviews.author: JOSEPH V WOTZKA

customer_reviews.title: too small
customer_reviews.text: Not a true size for what the tag says. It's at least three sizes smaller.
customer_reviews.author: XXX

customer_reviews.title: not very happy!
customer_reviews.text: it was too small..couldnt sent it back becuase there some info missing, now im stuck with it..not very happy!
customer_reviews.author: peter

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: For the price you simply cannot do better then this. This jacket is VERY high quality, it's sturdy, the zipper are all thick and strong, and the leather seems to be good quality. It has an awesome classic look, and is well fitted, I didn't have an issue needing one size larger like some seem to. I'd recommend this to anyone and their mother (But, only if their mother wants to look bad*ss).
customer_reviews.author: ein37

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap quality leather buyer beware it's not very good
customer_reviews.author: 3 girl's

customer_reviews.title: My Son Loved it!
customer_reviews.text: I work in retail and this price of 79.99 does not reflect the quality of this jacket! It is the price of faux leather! Soft but sturdy with nice quilting in lining! We also got it before Christmas! Thank you for such a high quality jacket for a price I can afford!
customer_reviews.author: shoelover

customer_reviews.title: This jacket is amazing! My son wears it when he rides his ...
customer_reviews.text: This jacket is amazing! My son wears it when he rides his motorcycle. It looks just like the picture and is VERY good quality. It smells wonderful too - LEATHER!! I would highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Julie Bjarnson

product_meta.title: Xelement B7100 'Classic' Men's Black TOP GRADE Leather Motorcycle Biker Jacket

Xelement B7100 'Classic' Men's Black TOP GRADE Leather Motorcycle Biker Jacket

The Original Men’s Classic Motorcycle Jacket by Leading Biker Brand Xelement, Made from Premium Cowhide Leather with Heavy-Duty Silver Zippers. Don't Be Gentle with This Jacket, Xelement Jackets Are Made to Last! This Classic Leather Motorcycle Jacket Made of Premium Cowhide Leather Is A Top-Rated Item. Buy Direct from Our Factory and Save Big! Comfort and Features By Xelement Bike Gear Always Going The Extra Distance

Features

 * Zippered Cuffs
 * Built in Dual Side Concealed Weapon and Ammo Pocket
 * Quilted Polyester Liner
 * Media Pocket with Wire Feed
 * Adjustable Belted Waist
 * 2 Outside Zipper Pockets

 * Comfort and Features By Xelement Bike Gear Always Going The Extra Distance
